title: New MPfree: Orca Orca – Underground
content:
Since Introducing Orca Orca back in September last year, Jim Hewitt has come a long way in a short space of time, demonstrated perfectly on new track Underground. A reworking of a Young Minds demo from 2010, it benefits from cleaner production making it sound less twee and more ready for live performances. There’s touches of Mumm-ra, The Drums and Death Cab For Cutie on Underground, all combining to form two and a half minutes of idyllic, indie-pop; well worthy of a listen. Underground will form part of Orca Orca’s next release entitled Make Live, a limited edition cassette run featuring six new recordings and hand-painted artwork which drops 21 February.

Underground by orca orca
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
